title: (x) 'Les Choristes' credits - Palatino {Marc O}
content:
Can anyone tell me what this font is? It appeared in the French movie “Les Choristes”.

[http://www.geocities.com/tomtad23/jacquesperrin.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080926145300/http:/www.geocities.com/tomtad23/jacquesperrin.jpg "http://www.geocities.com/tomtad23/jacquesperrin.jpg")

Thanks!
